channel.title: the reason why ubuntu suck
channel.description:
Hallo guys.
Can you give me a good reason why ubuntu bad as host for whonix? if it is not used at all. Only hosting . Is VirtualBox whonix have value on what host does it?
I readed the FAQ and asked some questions. but they do not have any good reason why should not use Ubuntu as the host.

item.title: the reason why ubuntu suck
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
If the distribution has proven to be untrustworthy, don’t use it.

Read full topic

item.title: the reason why ubuntu suck
item.dc:creator: xaos
item.description:
HulaHoop:

Because they have a history of spying on users. You cannot have privacy if the host is against you.

tnx

Read full topic

item.title: the reason why ubuntu suck
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
xaos:

sudo dont work

Can you give me a good reason why ubuntu bad as host for whonix?

Because they have a history of spying on users. You cannot have privacy if the host is against you.

internet dont work

Requests to install the incomprehensible firmware

The reason your network card may not be working is it needs non-free firmware. Use these images instead to install. Always verify signatures to make sure your downloads are safe.

http://cdimage.debian.org/cdimage/unofficial/non-free/cd-including-firmware/8.6.0-live+nonfree/amd64/iso-hybrid/

sudo dont work

you’ll have to install that yourself. # log in as root then apt-get install sudo

Read full topic
